description:
SciPy 2013, the twelfth annual Scientific Computing with Python
conference, was held June 24th-29th 2013 in Austin, Texas. SciPy is a
community dedicated to the advancement of scientific computing through
open source Python software for mathematics, science, and engineering.
The annual SciPy Conference allows participants from academic,
commercial, and governmental organizations to showcase their latest
projects, learn from skilled users and developers, and collaborate on
code development.
title: SciPy 2013
